title: Rajma Chawal 🍚 / Red kidney beans curry| Lunch Recipe
content:
Lunch recipe: Rajma Chawal 🍚 Servings: 4 Duration: 40 minutes Rajma Chawal is a popular Indian vegetarian dish originated from Punjabi’s 😍 it’s a thick gravy made with red kidney beans, whole Indian spices and ghee. Mostly, this curry is served with rice. Today, I prepared this famous and delicious gravy curry with cooked red kidney beans, I hope you could try and enjoy your meal 🙂 . You might also like 👉 Rajma Pulao 👌   Let’s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Rajma - 160 gms
  • Onion - 1 - medium sized - paste - 1 cup
  • Tomatoes - 2 - medium sized - puree - 1 bowl
  • Ginger garlic paste - 1 Tb sp
  • Cumin seeds - 1 teaspoon
  • Red chilly powder - 3/4 teaspoon
  • Cumin powder - 1/2 Tb sp
  • Coriander Powder- 1 teaspoon
  • Garam masala powder - 1/4 teaspoon
  • Turmeric powder - 1/8 teaspoon
  • Salt - 2 teaspoon
  • Ghee - 1 Tb sp
  • Cloves - 3
  • Cinnamon stick - 1 inch
  • Bay leaf - 1
  • Black Cardamom - 1
  • Pepper Powder - 1/8 teaspoon
  • Coriander leaves - 1 cup - chopped
Procedure: Prepreparation: Cooking Rajma
  • In a bowl add Rajma and water, soak 12 hours
  • Add soaked beans in pressure cooker along with 1 teaspoon salt and turmeric powder
  • Cook for 3 whistles and turn off heat
  • Let it become cool
Process of making Rajma curry :
  • Put a heavy bottomed deep fry pan over medium heat
  • Add ghee, cumin seeds, cloves, cinnamon stick, bay leaf, black Cardamom and pepper powder. Sauté a minute
  • Then add ginger garlic paste, sauté till the color changes to brown
  • Next add onion paste and fry 2 minutes or till raw smell goes off
  • Now, add all spices and sauté a minute
  • Add tomato purée and sauté 15 minutes or till it becomes together
  • Next add cooked Rajma with 250 ml water
  • Mix well, cover with lid and cook more 15 minutes over medium heat
  • Turn off heat and garnish with chopped coriander leaves
  • Gently mix and serve with piping hot rice 🍚 or roti or Garlic butter Naan
  • Happy cooking 🥥 and have a great day 😃
